source.sqlReaderQuery:
with
	-- This sub query gets the limits of the data that will be processed
	FIL as (
		select
			ETL_EXCTN_ID
		from
			PGMPDM.[ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN]
		where
			IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'
	),
	
	-- This subquery gets the JOB ID. Returns -1 is the value is unknown
	JOB as (
		select
			coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
		from
			PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
		where
			ETL_JOB_NM = '#DSJobName#'		
	),
	
	-- This subquery gets the SRC_SYS_ID. Returns -1 is the value is unknown
	SYS as (
		select
			coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
		from
			PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
		where
			SRC_SYS_CD = 'TMF'			
	)
	
	


select
	G.GEO_DIM_UID,
	G.IOT_RGN_CD,
	G.IOT_RGN_NM,
	G.IMT_RGN_CD,
	G.IMT_SRGN_NM,
	G.SRGN_CD,
	G.SRGNCTRY_CD,
	G.SRGNCTRY_NM,
	G.IOTSORT_NUM,
	G.GEO_CD,
	G.GEO_TYP_CD,
	G.GMR_RGN_CD,
	G.GMR_RGN_NM,
	G.IOT_SHORT_NM,
	G.IMT_SHORT_NM,
	JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
	FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
	SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
from
	PGMPDM.GEO_DIM_TMF G
	left join
	JOB
	on 1 = 1
	left join
	FIL
	on 1 = 1
	left join
	SYS
	on 1 = 1

scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT 
C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID,
C.CNTRCT_NM AS CONTRACT,
H.PROC_DIM_UID AS UNIQUE_ID,
P.PROC_DSPLY_ID AS DISPLAY_ID,
Z.GLBL_BUY_GRP_ID,
PC.PROC_DIM_UID AS PARENT_UNIQUE_ID,  
PC.PROC_DSPLY_ID AS PARENT_DISPLAY_ID,
PC.TITLE_TXT AS PARENT_TITLE,
P.CLNT_REF_NUM AS CLIENT_REFERENCE,
--I.WKFLW_DEF_ID,
--I."DESC"  as  INIT_WKFLW_DEF_ID_DESCR,
P.TITLE_TXT AS PROC_TITLE,
P.PROC_DESC AS PROC_DESCRIPTION,
W.WKFLW_DEF_ID AS CURRENT_WORKFLOW,
WS.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_ID AS CURRENT_WKFLW_STEP,
WS.WKFLW_STEP_SEQ_NUM AS CURRENT_STEP_SEQ,
WS.WKFLW_STEP_DESC AS STEP_DESCRIPTION,
ST.STATE_TITLE_TXT STATE_DESC,
S.STAT_IBM_DESC AS STATUS_DESC,
O.ON_HOLD_DESC, 
H.ON_HOLD_DT,
HR.ON_HOLD_RSN_TXT,
P.ADTNL_DTLS_FOR_WITHDRW_HOLD_TXT, 
--decrypt_char(UD.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN,MR.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS ASSIGNED_TO,
AU.ADNC_TXT AS AUDIENCE,
PD.PRIORITY_TXT as PRIORITY_TXT,
CN.COND_TXT AS CONDITION,
COALESCE(RGN.REGION,GEO.KYNDRYL_RGN) AS REGION,
--decrypt_char(CR.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN,MR.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS CREATED_BY,
--decrypt_char(P.RQSTR_TXT,
MR.MIS_REP_REF_CD AS REQUESTOR,
GEO.SRGNCTRY_NM AS COUNTRY,                                                                                                                                  
CC.CNTRCT_REF_TXT AS AGREEMENT_REFERENCE_DETAILS,
CASE CC.ORIG_ORG WHEN 'C' THEN 'Client' WHEN 'I' THEN 'IBM' WHEN 'R' THEN 'RFS' ELSE '' END AS ORIGINATING_ORG,
---decrypt_char(CC.IBM_APPRVR_TXT,MR.MIS_REP_REF_CD)  AS IBM_APPRVR_TXT,
--decrypt_char(CC.CLNT_APPRVR_TXT,MR.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS CLNT_APPRVR_TXT ,     
H.SRC_CRETD_TMS AS CREATED_DATE,
H.SRC_UPDTD_TMS AS LAST_UPDATED,
F.DUE_DT,
F.RVSD_DUE_DT,
/*DAYS(NVL(F.DUE_DT,F.RVSD_DUE_DT)) - DAYS((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - CURRENT_TIMEZONE) + AF.TZ HOURS) AS DUE_IN_DAY_CNT,
CASE WHEN DAYS(NVL(F.RVSD_DUE_DT,F.DUE_DT)) - DAYS((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - CURRENT_TIMEZONE) + AF.TZ HOURS)  < 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS OVERDUE,*/      
F.IBM_APPRVL_SIGNED_DT,
F.CLNT_APPRVL_SIGNED_DT,
F.CNTRCT_EX_DT,
H.CMPLTD_DT AS COMPLETION_DATE,
P.CMPLTD_RSN_TXT,
CC.CNTRCT_DELVRBL_CNFRMN_IND,
CC.FRML_AMNDMNT_NBR_TXT,
CC.CNTRCT_BSLN_CNFRMN_IND,
CC.STAFFG_SKILL_CNFRMN_IND,
CC.FIN_CNFRMN_IND,
CC.RJCT_RSN_ID,
CC.RJCT_EXPLNN_TXT,
CC.CNTRCT_REM_TXT,
CC.RJCT_RSN_TXT, 
SR.SRC_SYS_CD,
' ' AS LEGACY_UNIQUE_ID,
' ' AS LEGACY_DISPLAYED_ID,
TRIM(SUBSTRING(ND.NOTES_DESC,1,50)) AS LATEST_IBM_ONLY_NOTE,
TRIM(SUBSTRING(PN.NOTES_DESC,1,50)) AS LATEST_IBM_AND_CLIENT_NOTE,
CT.CNTRCT_TYPE_DESC,
PT.PROC_TYPE_ID,
PT.PROC_TYPE_DESC,
O.ON_HOLD_CD,
H.WITHDRWN_DIM_UID,
H.WITHDRWN_DT,
H.ORGNZN_DIM_UID,
DI.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_1,
DI.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_2,
DI.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_3,
DI.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_4,
DI.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_5,
DI.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_6,
DI.IBM_ONLY_DATE_1,
DI.IBM_ONLY_DATE_2,
DI.IBM_ONLY_DATE_3,
DI.IBM_ONLY_DATE_4,
DI.IBM_ONLY_DATE_5,
DI.IBM_ONLY_DATE_6,
DP.PUBLIC_TEXT_1,
DP.PUBLIC_TEXT_2,
DP.PUBLIC_TEXT_3,
DP.PUBLIC_TEXT_4,
DP.PUBLIC_TEXT_5,
DP.PUBLIC_TEXT_6,
DP.PUBLIC_DATE_1,
DP.PUBLIC_DATE_2,
DP.PUBLIC_DATE_3,
DP.PUBLIC_DATE_4,
DP.PUBLIC_DATE_5,
DP.PUBLIC_DATE_6,
SO.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DESC AS STATE_OF_ORGANIZATION,
SD.SCTR_NM,
Z.CLIENT_UNIT_NM AS CLIENT_UNIT
FROM PGMPDM.PROC_HEADR_FCT H

INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_TYPE_DIM PT ON PT.PROC_TYPE_DIM_UID = H.PROC_TYPE_DIM_UID AND PT.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_DIM P ON P.PROC_DIM_UID = H.PROC_DIM_UID AND P.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_DIM C ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = P.CNTRCT_DIM_UID AND C.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'

INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM CT ON CT.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID AND CT.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
--INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_DEF_DIM I ON I.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID = H.INIT_WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID AND I.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_DEF_DIM W ON W.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID = H.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID AND W.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'  

INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM WS ON WS.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM_UID = H.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM_UID AND WS.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' 
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.STATE_DIM ST ON ST.STATE_DIM_UID = H.STATE_DIM_UID AND ST.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM PS ON P.PROC_DIM_UID = PS.PROC_DIM_UID AND P.CURR_PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM_UID = PS.PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM_UID AND PS.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'

INNER JOIN PGMPDM.GEO_DIM GEO ON 1=1
-- GEO.GEO_DIM_UID = H.GEO_DIM_UID AND GEO.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.MISC_FCT F ON F.PROC_HEADR_FCT_UID = H.PROC_HEADR_FCT_UID AND F.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_CHG_DIM CC ON CC.CNTRCT_CHG_DIM_UID = P.PROC_DIM_UID AND CC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'

INNER JOIN PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM SR ON SR.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID = H.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID AND SR.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
INNER JOIN PGMPDM.SCTR_DIM SD ON SD.SCTR_DIM_UID = C.SCTR_DIM_UID AND SD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'

LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.STAT_DIM S ON S.STAT_DIM_UID = H.STAT_DIM_UID AND S.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.MISC_REP_REF MR ON MIS_REP_REF_UID = 3

LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.USER_DIM UD ON UD.USER_ID = PS.ASSGN_TO_NUM AND UD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ADNC_DIM AU ON AU.ADNC_CD = P.ADNC_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PRIORITY_DIM PD ON PD.PRIORITY_NUM = P.PRIORTY_NUM

LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.COND_DIM CN ON CN.COND_CD = P.CNDTN_CD
LEFT OUTER JOIN APPFUN.PROC_REGION_V RGN ON RGN.PROC_ID = P.PROC_DIM_UID AND RGN.INTERNAL_VAL <> 'NONE'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.USER_DIM CR ON CR.USER_DIM_UID = H.CRETD_BY_USER_DIM_UID AND CR.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'

LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.NOTES_DIM ND ON ND.PROC_DIM_UID = P.PROC_DIM_UID AND ND.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' AND ND.NOTE_TYPE_CD = 'I' AND ND.LATEST_NOTE_IND = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.NOTES_DIM PN ON PN.PROC_DIM_UID = P.PROC_DIM_UID AND PN.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' AND PN.NOTE_TYPE_CD = 'P' AND PN.LATEST_NOTE_IND = 'Y'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ON_HOLD_DIM O ON O.ON_HOLD_DIM_UID = H.ON_HOLD_DIM_UID AND O.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'

LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ON_HOLD_RSN_DIM HR ON HR.ON_HOLD_RSN_ID = P.ON_HOLD_RSN_ID AND HR.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_DIM PC ON PC.PROC_DIM_UID = P.PARNT_PROC_ID AND PC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_CSTM_DATA_PUBLIC_DIM DP ON DP.PROC_DIM_UID = P.PROC_DIM_UID

LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_CSTM_DATA_IBM_CLIENT_DIM DI ON DI.PROC_DIM_UID = P.PROC_DIM_UID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ORG_CNTRCT_MAP_DIM OM ON OM.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ORGNZN_DIM OD ON OD.ORGNZN_DIM_UID = OM.ORGNZN_DIM_UID

LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM SO ON SO.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM_UID = OD.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM_UID
--LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_TZ_V AF ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = AF.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ZAUX_CNTRCT_GLBL_BUY_GRP_MAP Z ON Z.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID 

WHERE H.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' AND PT.PROC_TYPE_ID = 'CONTRCHG' AND P.ADNC_ACCSS_CD <> 'C' AND H.DELD_DT IS NULL AND SR.SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'



',

query: 'SELECT 
     C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID,
     C.CNTRCT_NM AS CONTRACT,
     HFCT.PROC_DIM_UID AS UNIQUE_ID,
     PROCS.CLNT_REF_NUM AS CLIENT_REFERENCE,
     PROCS.PROC_DSPLY_ID AS DISPLAY_ID,
     ZACNTRCT.GLBL_BUY_GRP_ID,
     PARENT_PROC.PROC_DIM_UID AS PARENT_UNIQUE_ID,
     PARENT_PROC.PROC_DSPLY_ID AS PARENT_DISPLAY_ID,
     PARENT_PROC.TITLE_TXT AS PARENT_TITLE,
     PROCS.TITLE_TXT AS PROC_TITLE,
     INITWDD.WKFLW_DEF_ID,
     INITWDD."DESC" AS INIT_WKFLW_DEF_ID_DESCR,
     PROCS.PROC_DESC AS PROC_DESCRIPTION,
     WKFLW.WKFLW_DEF_ID AS CURRENT_WORKFLOW,
     WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_ID AS CURRENT_WKFLW_STEP,
     WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_SEQ_NUM AS CURRENT_STEP_SEQ,
     WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_DESC AS STEP_DESCRIPTION,
     ST.STATE_TITLE_TXT STATE_DESC,
     STAT.STAT_IBM_DESC AS STATUS_DESC,
     ASSGNTO.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN AS ASSIGNED_TO, --decrypt_char(ASSGNTO.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS ASSIGNED_TO,
     AUDIENCE.ADNC_TXT AS AUDIENCE,
     P.PRIORITY_TXT,
     COND.COND_TXT AS CONDITION,
     COALESCE(RGN.REGION,GEO.KYNDRYL_RGN) AS REGION,
     PROCS.RQSTR_TXT AS REQUESTOR, --decrypt_char(PROCS.RQSTR_TXT,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS REQUESTOR,
     CREATOR.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN AS CREATED_BY, --decrypt_char(CREATOR.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS CREATED_BY,
     HFCT.SRC_CRETD_TMS AS CREATED_DATE,
     HFCT.SRC_UPDTD_TMS AS LAST_UPDATED,
     FCT.RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT AS RISK_RESPONSE_DUE_DATE,
     FCT.RVSD_RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT AS REVISED_RISK_RESPONSE_DUE_DATE,
     DATEDIFF(day, '2000/01/01', ISNULL(FCT.RVSD_RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT,FCT.RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT)) - DATEDIFF(day, '2000/01/01', DATEADD(hh, AF.TZ, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) AS DUE_IN_DAY_CNT,
     CASE 
          WHEN DATEDIFF(day, '2000/01/01', ISNULL(FCT.RVSD_RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT,FCT.RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT)) - DATEDIFF(day, '2000/01/01', DATEADD(hh, AF.TZ, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)) < 0 THEN 'Y' 
          ELSE 'N' 
     END AS OVERDUE,
     HFCT.CMPLTD_DT AS COMPLETION_DATE,
     PROCS.CMPLTD_RSN_TXT AS COMPLETION_REASON,
     GEO.SRGNCTRY_NM AS COUNTRY,
     RISKSRC.RISK_SRC_TXT AS RISK_SOURCE,
     RISK.RISK_REM_TXT AS REMARKS,
     RISK.ORGNTG_ORGNZN_TXT AS ORIGINATING_ORG,
     RISK.RISK_OWNR_TXT AS RISK_OWNER, --decrypt_char(RISK.RISK_OWNR_TXT,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS RISK_OWNER,
     FCT.PRBBLTY_NUM AS PROBABILITY,
     CASE 
          WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'Z' THEN '10' 
          WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'D' THEN '25' 
          WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'C' THEN '50' 
          WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'S' THEN '75' 
     END AS PROBABILITY_SMPL ,
     FCT.IMPCT_CD AS IMPACT,
     RISK.MTGTN_RSPNS_PLAN_TXT AS RESPONSE_PLAN,
     CRNCY.CRNCY_NM AS LOCAL_CURRENCY,
     FCT.IMPCT_AMT AS IMPACT_AMOUNT_LOCAL_CURRENCY,
     RISK.GS_RISK_ID ,
     CASE 
          WHEN RISK.BUS_CNTRL_RISK_IND='Y' THEN 'YES' 
          WHEN RISK.BUS_CNTRL_RISK_IND='N' THEN 'NO' 
     END AS BUSINESS_CONTROLS_RISK,
     RISK.WWRADB_REF_TXT AS WWBCIT_REFERENCE,
     FCT.RISK_ANLYSS_DUE_DT,
     FCT.RVSD_RISK_ANLYSS_DUE_DT,
     CASE 
          WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'ACC' THEN 'Accept/Retain' 
          WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'AVO' THEN 'Avoid' 
          WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'CON' THEN 'Contain/Reduce' 
          WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'INS' THEN 'Use Insurance'  
          WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'XFR' THEN 'Transfer' 
          WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'RES' THEN 'Use Risk Reserve' 
          ELSE RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD 
     END AS RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD,
     RISK.RISK_OCCURRED_CD,
     RISK.RISK_CLOSE_RSN_TXT,
     SRC.SRC_SYS_CD,
     '' AS LEGACY_UNIQUE_ID,
     '' AS LEGACY_DISPLAYED_ID,
     TRIM(INOTES.NOTES_DESC) AS LATEST_IBM_ONLY_NOTE,
     TRIM(PNOTES.NOTES_DESC) AS LATEST_IBM_AND_CLIENT_NOTE,
     CTYPE.CNTRCT_TYPE_DESC,
     PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_ID,
     PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_DESC,
     ONHOLD.ON_HOLD_CD,
     HFCT.WITHDRWN_DIM_UID,
     HFCT.WITHDRWN_DT,
     HFCT.ORGNZN_DIM_UID,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_1,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_2,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_3,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_4,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_5,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_6,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_1,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_2,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_3,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_4,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_5,
     DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_6,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_1,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_2,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_3,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_4,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_5,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_6,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_1,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_2,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_3,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_4,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_5,
     DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_6,
     SOO.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DESC AS STATE_OF_ORGANIZATION,
     SCTR.SCTR_NM,
     ZACNTRCT.CLIENT_UNIT_NM AS CLIENT_UNIT

FROM 
     PGMPDM.RISK_DIM RISK
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_HEADR_FCT HFCT ON HFCT.PROC_DIM_UID = RISK.RISK_DIM_UID AND HFCT.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_TYPE_DIM PTYPE ON PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_DIM_UID = HFCT.PROC_TYPE_DIM_UID AND PTYPE.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_DIM PROCS ON PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID = HFCT.PROC_DIM_UID AND PROCS.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_DIM C ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = PROCS.CNTRCT_DIM_UID AND C.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM CTYPE ON CTYPE.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID AND CTYPE.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_DEF_DIM INITWDD ON INITWDD.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID = HFCT.INIT_WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID AND INITWDD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_DEF_DIM WKFLW ON WKFLW.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID = HFCT.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID AND WKFLW.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM WKFLW_STEP ON WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM_UID = HFCT.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM_UID AND WKFLW_STEP.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' 
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.STATE_DIM ST ON ST.STATE_DIM_UID = HFCT.STATE_DIM_UID AND ST.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM PSD ON PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID = PSD.PROC_DIM_UID AND PROCS.CURR_PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM_UID = PSD.PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM_UID AND PSD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.GEO_DIM GEO ON GEO.GEO_DIM_UID = HFCT.GEO_DIM_UID -- AND GEO.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.MISC_FCT FCT ON FCT.PROC_HEADR_FCT_UID = HFCT.PROC_HEADR_FCT_UID AND FCT.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM SRC ON SRC.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID = HFCT.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID AND SRC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.SCTR_DIM SCTR ON SCTR.SCTR_DIM_UID = C.SCTR_DIM_UID AND SCTR.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.STAT_DIM STAT ON STAT.STAT_DIM_UID = HFCT.STAT_DIM_UID AND STAT.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.MISC_REP_REF MIS_REP_REF ON MIS_REP_REF_UID = 3
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.USER_DIM ASSGNTO ON ASSGNTO.USER_ID = PSD.ASSGN_TO_NUM AND ASSGNTO.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ADNC_DIM AUDIENCE ON AUDIENCE.ADNC_CD = PROCS.ADNC_CD
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PRIORITY_DIM P ON P.PRIORITY_NUM = PROCS.PRIORTY_NUM
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.COND_DIM COND ON COND.COND_CD = PROCS.CNDTN_CD
     LEFT OUTER JOIN APPFUN.PROC_REGION_V RGN ON RGN.PROC_ID = PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID AND RGN.INTERNAL_VAL <> 'NONE'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.USER_DIM CREATOR ON CREATOR.USER_DIM_UID = HFCT.CRETD_BY_USER_DIM_UID AND CREATOR.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.NOTES_DIM INOTES ON INOTES.PROC_DIM_UID = PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID AND INOTES.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' AND INOTES.NOTE_TYPE_CD = 'I' AND INOTES.LATEST_NOTE_IND = 'Y'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.NOTES_DIM PNOTES ON PNOTES.PROC_DIM_UID = PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID AND PNOTES.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' AND PNOTES.NOTE_TYPE_CD = 'P' AND PNOTES.LATEST_NOTE_IND = 'Y'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ON_HOLD_DIM ONHOLD ON ONHOLD.ON_HOLD_DIM_UID = HFCT.ON_HOLD_DIM_UID AND ONHOLD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ON_HOLD_RSN_DIM HOLDRSN ON HOLDRSN.ON_HOLD_RSN_ID = PROCS.ON_HOLD_RSN_ID AND HOLDRSN.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.CRNCY_DIM CRNCY ON CRNCY.CRNCY_DIM_UID = FCT.LOCAL_CRNCY_DIM_UID AND CRNCY.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_DIM PARENT_PROC ON PARENT_PROC.PROC_DIM_UID = PROCS.PARNT_PROC_ID AND PARENT_PROC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.RISK_SRC_DIM RISKSRC ON RISKSRC.RISK_SRC_DIM_CD = RISK.RISK_SRC_IND AND RISKSRC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_CSTM_DATA_PUBLIC_DIM DATAPBLIC ON DATAPBLIC.PROC_DIM_UID = PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_CSTM_DATA_IBM_CLIENT_DIM DATAIBM ON DATAIBM.PROC_DIM_UID = PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ORG_CNTRCT_MAP_DIM ORG_MAP ON ORG_MAP.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ORGNZN_DIM ORG ON ORG.ORGNZN_DIM_UID = ORG_MAP.ORGNZN_DIM_UID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM SOO ON SOO.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM_UID = ORG.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM_UID
     --LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_TZ_V AF ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = AF.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN (
          SELECT DISTINCT 
               C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID,
              CASE
                  WHEN B.TMZONE_DESC LIKE '(GMT)%' THEN 0
                  WHEN B.TMZONE_DESC LIKE '(GMT+%' THEN CAST(SUBSTRING(B.TMZONE_DESC, 6, 2) AS INT)
                  WHEN B.TMZONE_DESC LIKE '(GMT-%' THEN CAST(SUBSTRING(B.TMZONE_DESC, 6, 2) AS INT) * -1
                  ELSE 0
              END TZ
          FROM
              PGMPDM.ORGNZN_DIM A,
              PGMPDM.TMZONE_DIM B,
              PGMPDM.CNTRCT_DIM C,
              PGMPDM.ORG_CNTRCT_MAP_DIM D
          WHERE
              A.TMZONE_DIM_UID = B.TMZONE_DIM_UID
              AND A.ORGNZN_DIM_UID = D.ORGNZN_DIM_UID
              AND C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = D.CNTRCT_DIM_UID 
      ) AF ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = AF.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ZAUX_CNTRCT_GLBL_BUY_GRP_MAP ZACNTRCT ON ZACNTRCT.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID 

WHERE 
     RISK.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' 
     AND PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_ID IN ('RISK', 'RISKNEW') 
     AND PROCS.ADNC_ACCSS_CD <> 'C' 
     AND HFCT.DELD_DT IS NULL 
     AND SRC.SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'',

query: 'Select
     ACC.PROC_ID as ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID,
     ACC.PROJECT_ID as PRJCT_ID,
     cast(ACC.REMARKS as varchar(1024)) as ACCTRPTS_REM_TXT,
     ACC.CREATED_TS as SRC_CRETD_TMS,
     ACC.CREATED_USERID as SRC_CRETD_USER_ID,
     ACC.UPDATED_TS as SRC_UPDTD_TMS,
     ACC.UPDATED_USERID as SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID,
     case when PDEL.PROC_ID is null then 0 else 1 end as IS_DELETED
from
     APPFUN.ACCTRPTS ACC
     inner join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS ZDT
     on ACC.PROC_ID = ZDT.PROC_ID
     left join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DELD_PROC_ID PDEL
     on ACC.PROC_ID = PDEL.PROC_ID
     left join
     (
          Select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          where
               ETL_JOB_NM = 'BALD0010_ACCTRPTS_DIM'          
     ) as JOB
     on '1' = '1'
     left join
     (
          Select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID,
               ETL_PARAM_START_TMS,
               ETL_PARAM_END_TMS
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN
          where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'
     ) as FIL
     on '1' = '1'
     left join
     (
          Select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          from
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'               
     ) as SYS
     on '1' = '1'
',

query: 'Select
     S.ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID as LKP_ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID,
     S.PRJCT_ID as LKP_PRJCT_ID,
     S.ACCTRPTS_REM_TXT as LKP_ACCTRPTS_REM_TXT,

scriptLines:
query: 'select
     ACCTS.PROC_ID as ACCTSPFC_DIM_UID,
     ACCTS.PROJECT_ID as PRJCT_ID,
     cast(ACCTS.REMARKS as varchar(4096)) as ACCTSPFC_REM_TXT,
     ACCTS.CREATED_TS as SRC_CRETD_TMS,
     ACCTS.CREATED_USERID as SRC_CRETD_USER_ID,
     ACCTS.UPDATED_TS as SRC_UPDTD_TMS,
     ACCTS.UPDATED_USERID as SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID,
     case when PDEL.PROC_ID is null then 0 else 1 end as IS_DELETED
from
     APPFUN.ACCTSPFC ACCTS
     inner join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS ZDT
     on ACCTS.PROC_ID = ZDT.PROC_ID
     left join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DELD_PROC_ID PDEL
     on ACCTS.PROC_ID = PDEL.PROC_ID
     left join
     (select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          where
               ETL_JOB_NM = '#DSJobName#')JOB
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     (select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID,
               ETL_PARAM_START_TMS,
               ETL_PARAM_END_TMS
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN
          where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y') FIL
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     (select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          from
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP')SYS
     on 1 = 1',

',

query: 'Select
     (Select 
          coalesce(max(CNTRCT_DIM_UID), 0) 
      From PGMPDM.CNTRCT_DIM
     ) as MAX_ID,
     ROW_NUMBER() over (order by C.CNTRCT_ID) as ROW_NUM,
     C.CNTRCT_ID as CNTRCT_ID,
     C.CLIENT_ID as CLNT_DIM_UID, -- The CLIENT_ID is reused as CLNT_DIM_UID, not look up required
     SND.SO_NONSO_DIM_UID as SO_NONSO_DIM_UID,
     coalesce(C.STATUS, PC.STATUS) as CNTRCT_STATE_CD,
     coalesce(C.CNTCT, PC.CNTCT) as CNTCT_TXT,
     C.CNTRCT_NUMBER as CNTRCT_NUM,
     C.NAME as CNTRCT_NM,
     C.CNTRCT_ATTCHMNT_LOC as CNTRCT_ATTCHMT_LCTN_TXT,
     C.CNTRCT_START_DATE     as START_DT,
     C.CNTRCT_END_DATE as END_DT,
     PC.LINE_OF_BUSINESS_TYPE as LINE_OF_BUS_TYPE_CD,
     PC.INDUSTRY_TXT as INDSTRY_TXT,
     PC.INDUSTRY_SOURCE_TXT as INDSTRY_SRC_TXT,
     PC.VERIFIED_DATE as VRFYD_DT,
     PC.INDUSTRY_OVERRIDDEN_FLAG as INDSTRY_OVERRDEN_IND,
     G.GEO_DIM_UID as GEO_DIM_UID,
     coalesce(SD.SCTR_DIM_UID, -1) as SCTR_DIM_UID,
     coalesce(CT.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID, -1) as CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID,
     case 
          when PRIVATE_CONTRACTS.CNTRCT_ID is null then cast('N' as char(1)) 
          else cast('Y' as char(1)) 
     end as PRVT_IND,
     C.CREATED_TS as SRC_CRETD_TMS,
     C.CREATED_USERID as SRC_CRETD_USER_ID,
     C.UPDATED_TS as SRC_UPDTD_TMS,
     C.UPDATED_USERID as SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID,
    C.CLIENT_UNIT as CLIENT_UNIT
From
     APPFUN.CNTRCT C
     left join
     APPFUN.PST_CNTRCT PC
     on C.CNTRCT_ID = PC.PST_CNTRCT_ID
     -- SO_NONSO_DIM_UID: Find out if the contract is defined as Non-SO
     left join
     APPFUN.NON_SO_CNTRCT_TMF SOTMF
     on C.CNTRCT_ID = SOTMF.CNTRCT_ID
     left join
     PGMPDM.SO_NONSO_DIM SND
     -- The case validates if the TMF record for the contract is null
     -- If the value is null, the contract is NOT considered Non-SO, which means "SO"
     -- Otherwise, if the contract id is found in the tmf table, 
     -- it implies that the record should be treated as "NON_SO" 
     on case when SOTMF.CNTRCT_ID is null then 'SO' else 'NON_SO' end = SND.SO_NONSO_CD
     -- GEO_DIM_UID: find out the corresponding GEO record
    left join
    APPFUN.ORG_CNTRCT_MAP OCM 
    on C.CNTRCT_ID = OCM.CNTRCT_ID
    left join
    APPFUN.PST_ORG O 
    on OCM.ORG_ID = O.PST_ORG_ID
    left join
    PGMPDM.GEO_DIM G
    on O.CNTRY = G.SRGN_CD     
    -- SCTR_DIM_UID: find out the corresponding sector
     left join
     PGMPDM.SCTR_DIM SD
     on PC.INDUSTRY_TXT = SD.ISU_INDSTRY_CD         
     -- CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID: Logic to find out the corresponding contract type
     left join 
     PGMPDM.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM CT
     on 
          case
            when O.TST_ACCNT_IND = 'Y' AND C.CNTRCT_ID = 1203950002 then 'Production Contract'  -- Jira PGMP-931
               when /*O.PST_ORG_STATUS = 'O' and */ O.ORG_ACTV_FLAG = 'N' then 'Inactive Contract'   ---  795819
               when O.TST_ACCNT_IND ='Y' then 'Test Contract'
            when O.TST_ACCNT_IND ='I' then 'Inactive Contract'    ------ added as part of 553286
               when C.STATUS = 'A' and lower(C.NAME) like 'test%' then 'Test Contract'          
               else 'Production Contract'
        end = CT.CNTRCT_TYPE_DESC
     -- Determination of the private contracts    
    left join (
          Select 
               OCM.CNTRCT_ID
          From 
               (
                    Select
                         ORG_ID
                    From
                         APPFUN.ORG R
                    Where
                         R.PARENT_ORG_ID is null
                         and upper(R.TITLE) like '%PRIVATE%'                               
               ) R
               left join
               APPFUN.ORG C1
               on R.ORG_ID = C1.PARENT_ORG_ID
               left join
               APPFUN.ORG C2
               on C1.ORG_ID = C2.PARENT_ORG_ID
               left join
               APPFUN.ORG C3
               on C2.ORG_ID = C3.PARENT_ORG_ID
               left join
               APPFUN.ORG_CNTRCT_MAP OCM
               on 
                    C1.ORG_ID = OCM.ORG_ID
                    or C2.ORG_ID = OCM.ORG_ID
                    or C3.ORG_ID = OCM.ORG_ID
          Where
               OCM.CNTRCT_ID is not null     
     ) PRIVATE_CONTRACTS
    on C.CNTRCT_ID = PRIVATE_CONTRACTS.CNTRCT_ID
     left join (
          Select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          From
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          Where
               ETL_JOB_NM = 'BALD1090_CNTRCT_DIM'          
     ) JOB
     on 1 = 1
     left join (
          Select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID
          From
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN
          Where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'
     ) FIL
     on 1 = 1
     left join (
          Select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          From
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          Where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'               
     ) SYS
     on 1 = 1',

query: 'Select
     CNTRCT_ID as LKP_CNTRCT_ID,
     CLNT_DIM_UID as LKP_CLNT_DIM_UID,
     SO_NONSO_DIM_UID as LKP_SO_NONSO_DIM_UID,

From

From
     PGMPDM.PROC_DIM PROCS
     INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_DIM C ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = PROCS.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
     INNER JOIN (
          Select distinct
               PROC_DIM_UID
          From     
               PGMPDM.PROC_CSTM_DATA_IBM_CLIENT_DIM
          Where     
               COALESCE(
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_1,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_2,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_3,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_4,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_5,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_6,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_7,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_8,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_9,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_10,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_11,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_12,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_13,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_14,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_15,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_16,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_17,
                    IBM_ONLY_TEXT_18,

                    CAST(IBM_ONLY_DATE_13 AS VARCHAR),
                    CAST(IBM_ONLY_DATE_14 AS VARCHAR),
                    CAST(IBM_ONLY_DATE_15 AS VARCHAR)
               ) NOT IN ('', 'NULL')
     ) KoPROC ON KoPROC.PROC_DIM_UID = PROCS.PROC_DIM_UID
     LEFT OUTER JOIN (
          Select distinct
               DKo.PROC_DIM_UID,
               DKo.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_1 AS KYNDRYL_ONLY_TEXT_1,
               DKoTime.UPDATED_TIMESTAMP,
               USER_DIM.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN AS USER_ID -- decrypt_char(USER_DIM.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN, MISC_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS USER_ID
          From

                    Where (DKoUser.PROC_ID = DKoTime.PROC_ID and DKoUser.UPDATED_TS = DKoTime.UPDATED_TIMESTAMP))
               LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.MISC_REP_REF as MISC_REP_REF ON MISC_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_UID = 3

query: 'with
     -- This sub query gets the limits of the data that will be processed
     FIL as (
          select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.[ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN]
          where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'
     ),
     
     -- This subquery gets the JOB ID. Returns -1 is the value is unknown
     JOB as (
          select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          where
               ETL_JOB_NM = '#DSJobName#'          
     ),
     
     -- This subquery gets the SRC_SYS_ID. Returns -1 is the value is unknown
     SYS as (
          select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          from
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'TMF'               
     )
     
     


select
     G.GEO_DIM_UID,
     G.IOT_RGN_CD/*,
     G.IOT_RGN_NM,
     G.IMT_RGN_CD,
     G.IMT_SRGN_NM,
     G.SRGN_CD,
     G.SRGNCTRY_CD,
     G.SRGNCTRY_NM,
     G.IOTSORT_NUM,
     G.GEO_CD,
     G.GEO_TYP_CD,
     G.GMR_RGN_CD,
     G.GMR_RGN_NM,
     G.IOT_SHORT_NM,
     G.IMT_SHORT_NM,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID*/
from
     PGMPDM.GEO_DIM_TMF G
     left join
     JOB
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     FIL
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     SYS
     on 1 = 1',

properties.description:
Job creation:05-06-2022
Job name: Df_BAL0001_GEO_DIM
CreatedBy: Varaprasad

This job will pull all GEO_TMF and loading into PGMPDM.GEO_DIM table

scriptLines:
query: 'select
     G.GEO_DIM_UID,
     G.IOT_RGN_CD,
     G.IOT_RGN_NM,
     G.IMT_RGN_CD,
     G.IMT_SRGN_NM,
     G.SRGN_CD,
     G.SRGNCTRY_CD,
     G.SRGNCTRY_NM,
     G.IOTSORT_NUM,
     G.GEO_CD,
     G.GEO_TYP_CD,
     G.GMR_RGN_CD,
     G.GMR_RGN_NM,
     G.IOT_SHORT_NM,
     G.IMT_SHORT_NM,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
from
     PGMPDM.GEO_DIM_TMF G
     left join
     (select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          where
               ETL_JOB_NM = '#DSJobName#'     )JOB
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     (select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.[ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN]
          where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y')FIL
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     (select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          from
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'TMF')SYS
     on 1 = 1
',

     IOT_SHORT_NM as LKP_IOT_SHORT_NM  ,
     IMT_SHORT_NM as LKP_IMT_SHORT_NM  ,
     ETL_JOB_ID as LKP_ETL_JOB_ID  ,
     SRC_SYS_DIM_UID as LKP_SRC_SYS_DIM_UID  
from
     PGMPDM.GEO_DIM',

query: 'select
     G.GEO_DIM_UID,
     G.IOT_RGN_CD,
     G.IOT_RGN_NM,
     G.IMT_RGN_CD,
     G.IMT_SRGN_NM,
     G.SRGN_CD,
     G.SRGNCTRY_CD,
     G.SRGNCTRY_NM,
     G.IOTSORT_NUM,
     G.GEO_CD,
     G.GEO_TYP_CD,
     G.GMR_RGN_CD,
     G.GMR_RGN_NM,
     G.IOT_SHORT_NM,
     G.IMT_SHORT_NM,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
from
     PGMPDM.GEO_DIM_TMF G
     left join
     (select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          where
               ETL_JOB_NM = '#DSJobName#'     )JOB
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     (select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.[ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN]
          where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y')FIL
     on 1 = 1
     left join
     (select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          from
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'TMF')SYS
     on 1 = 1
',

query: 'select
     GEO_DIM_UID,
     IOT_RGN_CD,
     IOT_RGN_NM,
     IMT_RGN_CD,
     IMT_SRGN_NM,
     SRGN_CD,
     SRGNCTRY_CD,
     SRGNCTRY_NM,
     IOTSORT_NUM,
     GEO_CD,
     GEO_TYP_CD,
     GMR_RGN_CD,
     GMR_RGN_NM,
     IOT_SHORT_NM,
     IMT_SHORT_NM,
     ETL_JOB_ID,
     SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
from
     PGMPDM.GEO_DIM
',

query: 'Select
     ACC.PROC_ID as ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID,
     ACC.PROJECT_ID as PRJCT_ID,
     cast(ACC.REMARKS as varchar(1024)) as ACCTRPTS_REM_TXT,
     ACC.CREATED_TS as SRC_CRETD_TMS,
     ACC.CREATED_USERID as SRC_CRETD_USER_ID,
     ACC.UPDATED_TS as SRC_UPDTD_TMS,
     ACC.UPDATED_USERID as SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID,
     JOB.ETL_JOB_ID,
     FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID,
     SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID,
     case when PDEL.PROC_ID is null then 0 else 1 end as IS_DELETED
from
     APPFUN.ACCTRPTS ACC
     inner join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS ZDT
     on ACC.PROC_ID = ZDT.PROC_ID
     left join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DELD_PROC_ID PDEL
     on ACC.PROC_ID = PDEL.PROC_ID
     left join
     (
          Select
               coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as ETL_JOB_ID
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS
          where
               ETL_JOB_NM = 'BALD0010_ACCTRPTS_DIM'          
     ) as JOB
     on '1' = '1'
     left join
     (
          Select
               ETL_EXCTN_ID,
               ETL_PARAM_START_TMS,
               ETL_PARAM_END_TMS
          from
               PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN
          where
               IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'
     ) as FIL
     on '1' = '1'
     left join
     (
          Select
               coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as SRC_SYS_DIM_UID
          from
               PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM
          where
               SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'               
     ) as SYS
     on '1' = '1'
',

query: 'Select
     S.ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID,
     S.PRJCT_ID,
     S.ACCTRPTS_REM_TXT,
     S.SRC_CRETD_TMS,
     S.SRC_CRETD_USER_ID,
     S.SRC_UPDTD_TMS,
     S.SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID,
     S.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID,
     S.ETL_JOB_ID
from
     PGMPDM.ACCTRPTS_DIM S
     inner join
     PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS ZDT
     on S.ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID = ZDT.PROC_ID     
     ',

query: 'SELECT 
    C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID,
    C.CNTRCT_NM AS CONTRACT,
    HFCT.PROC_DIM_UID AS UNIQUE_ID,
    PROC.CLNT_REF_NUM AS CLIENT_REFERENCE,
    PROC.PROC_DSPLY_ID AS DISPLAY_ID,
    ZACNTRCT.GLBL_BUY_GRP_ID,
    PARENT_PROC.PROC_DIM_UID AS PARENT_UNIQUE_ID,
    PARENT_PROC.PROC_DSPLY_ID AS PARENT_DISPLAY_ID,
    PARENT_PROC.TITLE_TXT AS PARENT_TITLE,
    PROC.TITLE_TXT AS PROC_TITLE,
    INITWDD.WKFLW_DEF_ID,
    INITWDD.DESC AS INIT_WKFLW_DEF_ID_DESCR,
    PROC.PROC_DESC AS PROC_DESCRIPTION,
    WKFLW.WKFLW_DEF_ID AS CURRENT_WORKFLOW,
    WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_ID AS CURRENT_WKFLW_STEP,
    WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_SEQ_NUM AS CURRENT_STEP_SEQ,
    WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_DESC AS STEP_DESCRIPTION,
    ST.STATE_TITLE_TXT STATE_DESC,
    STATUS.STAT_IBM_DESC AS STATUS_DESC,
    decrypt_char(ASSGNTO.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS ASSIGNED_TO,
    AUDIENCE.ADNC_TXT AS AUDIENCE,
    P.PRIORITY_TXT,
    COND.COND_TXT AS CONDITION,
    COALESCE(RGN.REGION,GEO.KYNDRYL_RGN) AS REGION,
    decrypt_char(PROC.RQSTR_TXT,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS REQUESTOR,
    decrypt_char(CREATOR.CONCAT_NM_LOGIN,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS CREATED_BY,
    HFCT.SRC_CRETD_TMS AS CREATED_DATE,
    HFCT.SRC_UPDTD_TMS AS LAST_UPDATED,
    FCT.RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT AS RISK_RESPONSE_DUE_DATE,
    FCT.RVSD_RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT AS REVISED_RISK_RESPONSE_DUE_DATE,
    DAYS(NVL(FCT.RVSD_RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT,FCT.RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT)) - DAYS((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - CURRENT_TIMEZONE) + AF.TZ HOURS) AS DUE_IN_DAY_CNT,
    CASE WHEN DAYS(NVL(FCT.RVSD_RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT,FCT.RISK_RSPNS_DUE_DT)) - DAYS((CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - CURRENT_TIMEZONE) + AF.TZ HOURS) < 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS OVERDUE,
    HFCT.CMPLTD_DT AS COMPLETION_DATE,
    PROC.CMPLTD_RSN_TXT AS COMPLETION_REASON,
    GEO.SRGNCTRY_NM AS COUNTRY,
    RISKSRC.RISK_SRC_TXT AS RISK_SOURCE,
    RISK.RISK_REM_TXT AS REMARKS,
    RISK.ORGNTG_ORGNZN_TXT AS ORIGINATING_ORG,
    decrypt_char(RISK.RISK_OWNR_TXT,MIS_REP_REF.MIS_REP_REF_CD) AS RISK_OWNER,
    FCT.PRBBLTY_NUM AS PROBABILITY,
    CASE 
        WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'Z' THEN '10' 
        WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'D' THEN '25' 
        WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'C' THEN '50' 
        WHEN FCT.PROBABILITY_SMPL =  'S' THEN '75' 
    END AS PROBABILITY_SMPL ,
    FCT.IMPCT_CD AS IMPACT,
    RISK.MTGTN_RSPNS_PLAN_TXT AS RESPONSE_PLAN,
    CRNCY.CRNCY_NM AS LOCAL_CURRENCY,
    FCT.IMPCT_AMT AS IMPACT_AMOUNT_LOCAL_CURRENCY,
    RISK.GS_RISK_ID ,
    CASE 
        WHEN RISK.BUS_CNTRL_RISK_IND='Y' THEN 'YES' 
        WHEN RISK.BUS_CNTRL_RISK_IND='N' THEN 'NO' 
    END AS BUSINESS_CONTROLS_RISK,
    RISK.WWRADB_REF_TXT AS WWBCIT_REFERENCE,
    FCT.RISK_ANLYSS_DUE_DT,
    FCT.RVSD_RISK_ANLYSS_DUE_DT,
    CASE 
        WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'ACC' THEN 'Accept/Retain' 
        WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'AVO' THEN 'Avoid' 
        WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'CON' THEN 'Contain/Reduce' 
        WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'INS' THEN 'Use Insurance'  
        WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'XFR' THEN 'Transfer' 
        WHEN RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD = 'RES' THEN 'Use Risk Reserve' 
        ELSE RISK.RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD 
    END AS RISK_RSPNS_TYPE_CD,
    RISK.RISK_OCCURRED_CD,
    RISK.RISK_CLOSE_RSN_TXT,
    SRC.SRC_SYS_CD,
    '' AS LEGACY_UNIQUE_ID,
    '' AS LEGACY_DISPLAYED_ID,
    TRIM(INOTES.NOTES_DESC) AS LATEST_IBM_ONLY_NOTE,
    TRIM(PNOTES.NOTES_DESC) AS LATEST_IBM_AND_CLIENT_NOTE,
    CTYPE.CNTRCT_TYPE_DESC,
    PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_ID,
    PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_DESC,
    ONHOLD.ON_HOLD_CD,
    HFCT.WITHDRWN_DIM_UID,
    HFCT.WITHDRWN_DT,
    HFCT.ORGNZN_DIM_UID,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_1,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_2,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_3,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_4,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_5,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_TEXT_6,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_1,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_2,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_3,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_4,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_5,
    DATAIBM.IBM_ONLY_DATE_6,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_1,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_2,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_3,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_4,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_5,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_TEXT_6,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_1,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_2,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_3,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_4,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_5,
    DATAPBLIC.PUBLIC_DATE_6,
    SOO.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DESC AS STATE_OF_ORGANIZATION,
    SCTR.SCTR_NM,
    ZACNTRCT.CLIENT_UNIT_NM AS CLIENT_UNIT

FROM 

    PGMPDM.RISK_DIM RISK
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_HEADR_FCT HFCT ON HFCT.PROC_DIM_UID = RISK.RISK_DIM_UID AND HFCT.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_TYPE_DIM PTYPE ON PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_DIM_UID = HFCT.PROC_TYPE_DIM_UID AND PTYPE.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_DIM PROC ON PROC.PROC_DIM_UID = HFCT.PROC_DIM_UID AND PROC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_DIM C ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = PROC.CNTRCT_DIM_UID AND C.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM CTYPE ON CTYPE.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_TYPE_DIM_UID AND CTYPE.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_DEF_DIM INITWDD ON INITWDD.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID = HFCT.INIT_WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID AND INITWDD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_DEF_DIM WKFLW ON WKFLW.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID = HFCT.WKFLW_DEF_DIM_UID AND WKFLW.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM WKFLW_STEP ON WKFLW_STEP.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM_UID = HFCT.WKFLW_STEP_DEF_DIM_UID AND WKFLW_STEP.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' 
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.STATE_DIM ST ON ST.STATE_DIM_UID = HFCT.STATE_DIM_UID AND ST.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM PSD ON PROC.PROC_DIM_UID = PSD.PROC_DIM_UID AND PROC.CURR_PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM_UID = PSD.PROC_STEP_DAT_DIM_UID AND PSD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.GEO_DIM GEO ON GEO.GEO_DIM_UID = HFCT.GEO_DIM_UID AND GEO.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.MISC_FCT FCT ON FCT.PROC_HEADR_FCT_UID = HFCT.PROC_HEADR_FCT_UID AND FCT.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM SRC ON SRC.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID = HFCT.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID AND SRC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    INNER JOIN PGMPDM.SCTR_DIM SCTR ON SCTR.SCTR_DIM_UID = C.SCTR_DIM_UID AND SCTR.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.STAT_DIM STATUS ON STATUS.STAT_DIM_UID = HFCT.STAT_DIM_UID AND STATUS.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.MISC_REP_REF MIS_REP_REF ON MIS_REP_REF_UID = 3
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.USER_DIM ASSGNTO ON ASSGNTO.USER_ID = PSD.ASSGN_TO_NUM AND ASSGNTO.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ADNC_DIM AUDIENCE ON AUDIENCE.ADNC_CD = PROC.ADNC_CD
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PRIORITY_DIM P ON P.PRIORITY_NUM = PROC.PRIORTY_NUM
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.COND_DIM COND ON COND.COND_CD = PROC.CNDTN_CD
    LEFT OUTER JOIN APPFUN.PROC_REGION_V RGN ON RGN.PROC_ID = PROC.PROC_DIM_UID AND RGN.INTERNAL_VAL <> 'NONE'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.USER_DIM CREATOR ON CREATOR.USER_DIM_UID = HFCT.CRETD_BY_USER_DIM_UID AND CREATOR.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.NOTES_DIM INOTES ON INOTES.PROC_DIM_UID = PROC.PROC_DIM_UID AND INOTES.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' AND INOTES.NOTE_TYPE_CD = 'I' AND INOTES.LATEST_NOTE_IND = 'Y'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.NOTES_DIM PNOTES ON PNOTES.PROC_DIM_UID = PROC.PROC_DIM_UID AND PNOTES.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' AND PNOTES.NOTE_TYPE_CD = 'P' AND PNOTES.LATEST_NOTE_IND = 'Y'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ON_HOLD_DIM ONHOLD ON ONHOLD.ON_HOLD_DIM_UID = HFCT.ON_HOLD_DIM_UID AND ONHOLD.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ON_HOLD_RSN_DIM HOLDRSN ON HOLDRSN.ON_HOLD_RSN_ID = PROC.ON_HOLD_RSN_ID AND HOLDRSN.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.CRNCY_DIM CRNCY ON CRNCY.CRNCY_DIM_UID = FCT.LOCAL_CRNCY_DIM_UID AND CRNCY.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_DIM PARENT_PROC ON PARENT_PROC.PROC_DIM_UID = PROC.PARNT_PROC_ID AND PARENT_PROC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.RISK_SRC_DIM RISKSRC ON RISKSRC.RISK_SRC_DIM_CD = RISK.RISK_SRC_IND AND RISKSRC.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D'
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_CSTM_DATA_PUBLIC_DIM DATAPBLIC ON DATAPBLIC.PROC_DIM_UID = PROC.PROC_DIM_UID
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.PROC_CSTM_DATA_IBM_CLIENT_DIM DATAIBM ON DATAIBM.PROC_DIM_UID = PROC.PROC_DIM_UID
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ORG_CNTRCT_MAP_DIM ORG_MAP ON ORG_MAP.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ORGNZN_DIM ORG ON ORG.ORGNZN_DIM_UID = ORG_MAP.ORGNZN_DIM_UID
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM SOO ON SOO.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM_UID = ORG.STAT_OF_ORGNZN_DIM_UID
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.CNTRCT_TZ_V AF ON C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = AF.CNTRCT_DIM_UID
    LEFT OUTER JOIN PGMPDM.ZAUX_CNTRCT_GLBL_BUY_GRP_MAP ZACNTRCT ON ZACNTRCT.CNTRCT_DIM_UID = C.CNTRCT_DIM_UID 

WHERE 
    RISK.ROW_STAT_CD <> 'D' 
    AND PTYPE.PROC_TYPE_ID IN ('RISK', 'RISKNEW') 
    AND PROC.ADNC_ACCSS_CD <> 'C' 
    AND HFCT.DELD_DT IS NULL 
    AND SRC.SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'




',
disjoint: false) ~> NoChangeRecords@(NoChangeRecords, ChangedRecordsForUpdate, NewrecodsForInsert, NotActiveInSource, RestAll)
disjoint: false) ~> NoChangeRecords@(NoChangeRecords, ChangedRecordsForUpdate, NewrecodsForInsert, NotActiveInSource, RestAll)

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession

# Read a csv file 
csv_path = adls_path + 'customer_data.csv' 
incrementalData_DF = spark.read.csv(csv_path, header = 'true')

natural_key="CUSTOMER_NO"
#columns1 = ["FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD","CUSTOMER_DESC","GBG_ID"]

# Get column list for creating Rec_Checksum

col_list=[]
for i in incrementalData_DF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)
    #print (col_list)

# Add a checsum column to help identify the changed rows

incrementalData_DF1 = incrementalData_DF.withColumn("nk_hash",md5(natural_key))
incrementalData_DF2 = incrementalData_DF1.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))

#sell_cyclecolhashDF.show()
incrementalData_DF2.createOrReplaceTempView("incrementalData_DF2")

#Create a deltalake table with necessary columns

#incrementalData_DF2.show()

existingDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT tgt.* from etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension tgt WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'")
#existingDF.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDF')

existingMaxKeyDF=spark.sql("SELECT MAX(CUSTOMER_KEY) existing_MAX_KEY from etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension tgt WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'")


# prefix all columns from target table with 'existing_'. This will help to differentiate columns when incremental and existing DF's are joined

existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])

#existingDataDF1.printSchema()

existingDataDF1.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDataDF1')

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1,incrementalData_DF2.CUSTOMER_NO == existingDataDF1.existing_CUSTOMER_NO, "fullouter") 
fullJoin2=fullJoin1.join(existingMaxKeyDF,None,"CROSS")

fullJoin2.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')

#Insert for New rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.

qry= """
INSERT INTO etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension 
select COALESCE(A.existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY,1 as VERSION , 
A.CUSTOMER_NO,A.FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,A.GBG_ID,A.CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
LEFT JOIN etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension B
ON A.CUSTOMER_NO=B.CUSTOMER_NO
AND CURRENT_IND='Y'
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND B.REC_CHECKSUM <> A.column_hash
;
"""

	SOURCE_SYSTEM varchar(50)  ,
	REC_CHECKSUM varchar(32)  ,
	REC_STATUS varchar(1)  ,
	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	DATA_IND varchar(10)  ,
	ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND char(1)  
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
conn = connect(':memory:')
natural_key="CUSTOMER_NO"
columns = ["FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD","CUSTOMER_DESC","GBG_ID"]
sas_url = "https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.blob.core.windows.net/customer/customer_data.csv?sv=2020-10-02&st=2022-05-15T14%3A59%3A08Z&se=2023-05-16T14%3A59%3A00Z&sr=b&sp=r&sig=RYE103C28iVzI4%2BTmiDyMqJhGGNqBooxZgUc4LITF4U%3D"
blob_client = BlobClient.from_blob_url(sas_url)
blob_data = blob_client.download_blob()
incrementalData = pd.read_csv(StringIO(blob_data.content_as_text()))
#print(df)
incrementalData_DF=spark.createDataFrame(incrementalData)
col_list=[]
for i in incrementalData_DF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)
    #print (col_list)
incrementalData_DF1 = incrementalData_DF.withColumn("nk_hash",md5(natural_key))
incrementalData_DF2 = incrementalData_DF1.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))
#sell_cyclecolhashDF.show()
incrementalData_DF2.createOrReplaceTempView("incrementalData_DF2")

#jdbc:sqlserver://asa-kyn-001494-dev-eus-001.sql.azuresynapse.net:1433;database=dsqlpoolKyn001494DevEtlHubEUS001;user=undefined@asa-kyn-001494-dev-eus-001;password={your_password_here};encrypt=true;trustServerCertificate=false;hostNameInCertificate=*.sql.azuresynapse.net;loginTimeout=30;
existingDataDF = spark.read.format("jdbc") \
    .option("url", f"jdbc:sqlserver://asa-kyn-001494-dev-eus-001.sql.azuresynapse.net:1433;databaseName=dsqlpoolKyn001494DevEtlHubEUS001;") \
    .option("query", "SELECT MAX(CUSTOMER_KEY) OVER (ORDER BY CUSTOMER_KEY  ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND UNBOUNDED FOLLOWING ) AS MAX_KEY, LOWER(CONVERT(VARCHAR(32),HashBytes('MD5', CUSTOMER_NO),2)) as existing_nk_hash,tgt.* FROM DBXDH.DHT_CUSTOMER as tgt WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'") \
    .option("user", "sqladminuser") \
    .option("password", "try2find$5") \
    .option("driver", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver") \
    .load()
#existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias("`"'existing_'+c+"`") for c in existingDataDF.columns])
existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])
#existingDataDF1.printSchema()
existingDataDF1.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDataDF')

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1,incrementalData_DF2.CUSTOMER_NO == existingDataDF1.existing_CUSTOMER_KEY, "fullouter") 
fullJoin1.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')

#Insert for New rows

fullJoin2=sqlContext.sql("select COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY,1 as VERSION , \
CUSTOMER_NO,FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,GBG_ID,CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, \
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, \
'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, \
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND \
from fullJoin A WHERE existing_existing_nk_hash is null")
fullJoin2.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin2')

#insert new rows into database

fullJoin2.write \
        .format("jdbc") \
        .option("url", f"jdbc:sqlserver://asa-kyn-001494-dev-eus-001.sql.azuresynapse.net:1433;databaseName=dsqlpoolKyn001494DevEtlHubEUS001;") \
        .option("user", "sqladminuser") \
        .option("password", "try2find$5") \
        .option("dbtable", "DBXDH.DHT_CUSTOMER") \
        .option("driver", "com.microsoft.sqlserver.jdbc.SQLServerDriver") \
        .option("forwardSparkAzureStorageCredentials", "true") \
        .mode("append") \
        .save()

    logger.info("Started")
    val spark = createSparkSession()
    val (jdbcURL, jdbcProps) = connectJDBC(spark)
    val sourceDF = sourceData(spark, jdbcURL, jdbcProps)
    sourceDF.show(5, false)
    val lookupDF = lookupData(spark, jdbcURL, jdbcProps)
    lookupDF.show(5, false)
    //val (insertDF, updateDF) = changeCapture(sourceDF, lookupDF)
    //loadTarget(insertDF, updateDF)
    spark.stop()
    logger.info("Stopped")
  }

  def createSparkSession() = {
    SparkSession.builder()
      //.master("local[5]")
      //.config(getSparkAppConf())
      .getOrCreate()
  }

  def connectJDBC(spark: SparkSession) = {
    val props = new Properties()
    //Ini data = new Ini(new File('properties.ini'))
    //val driverInfo = spark.read      .option("multiline",true)      .json("properties.json")
    val url = "sql-server-pgmp-dev.database.windows.net" //driverInfo.select("url").collect()(0).mkString("")
    props.put("url",url)
    props.put("user","pgmpetl") //driverInfo.select("username").collect()(0).mkString(""))
    props.put("password","Zaq1@wsxZaq1@wsx") //driverInfo.select("password").collect()(0).mkString(""))
    //props.setProperty("driver",driverInfo.select("driver").collect()(0).mkString(""))
    logger.info("Props - " + props)
    (url, props)
  }

  def sourceData(spark: SparkSession, jdbcURL: String, jdbcProps: Properties) = {
    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_EXCTN", jdbcProps)
      .select("ETL_EXCTN_ID", "ETL_PARAM_START_TMS", "ETL_PARAM_END_TMS")
      .where("IS_CURR_IND = 'Y'")
      .createOrReplaceTempView("FIL")

    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "PGMPDM.ZAUX_ETL_JOBS", jdbcProps)
      .where("ETL_JOB_NM = 'BALD0010_ACCTRPTS_DIM'")
      .selectExpr("coalesce(max(ETL_JOB_ID), -1) as `ETL_JOB_ID`")
      .createOrReplaceTempView("JOB")

    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "PGMPDM.SRC_SYS_DIM", jdbcProps)
      .where("SRC_SYS_CD = 'PGMP'")
      .selectExpr("coalesce(max(SRC_SYS_DIM_UID), -1) as `SRC_SYS_DIM_UID`")
      .createOrReplaceTempView("SYS")

    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "APPFUN.ACCTRPTS", jdbcProps)
      .createOrReplaceTempView("ACC")

    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS", jdbcProps)
      .createOrReplaceTempView("ZDT")

    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "PGMPDM.ZAUX_DELD_PROC_ID", jdbcProps)
      .createOrReplaceTempView("PDEL")

    spark.sql(
      """
        |Select
        |ACC.PROC_ID as ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID, ACC.PROJECT_ID as PRJCT_ID, cast(ACC.REMARKS as varchar(1024)) as ACCTRPTS_REM_TXT, 	ACC.CREATED_TS as SRC_CRETD_TMS, ACC.CREATED_USERID as SRC_CRETD_USER_ID, ACC.UPDATED_TS as SRC_UPDTD_TMS, ACC.UPDATED_USERID as SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID, JOB.ETL_JOB_ID, FIL.ETL_EXCTN_ID, SYS.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID, case when PDEL.PROC_ID is null then 0 else 1 end as IS_DELETED
        |From ACC
        |inner join ZDT on ACC.PROC_ID = ZDT.PROC_ID
        |left join PDEL on ACC.PROC_ID = PDEL.PROC_ID
        |left join JOB on 1 = 1
        |left join FIL on 1 = 1
        |left join SYS on 1 = 1
        |""".stripMargin)

  }

  def lookupData(spark: SparkSession, jdbcURL: String, jdbcProps: Properties) = {
    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "PGMPDM.ACCTRPTS_DIM", jdbcProps)
      .createOrReplaceTempView("S")

    spark.read.jdbc(jdbcURL, "PGMPDM.ZAUX_DATE_TRIGGERS", jdbcProps)
      .createOrReplaceTempView("ZDT")

    spark.sql(
      """
        |Select
        |S.ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID, S.PRJCT_ID, S.ACCTRPTS_REM_TXT, S.SRC_CRETD_TMS, S.SRC_CRETD_USER_ID, S.SRC_UPDTD_TMS, S.SRC_UPDTD_USER_ID, S.SRC_SYS_DIM_UID, S.ETL_JOB_ID
        |From S
        |inner join ZDT on S.ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID = ZDT.PROC_ID
        |order by S.ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID asc
        |""".stripMargin)
  }

  def changeCapture(sourceDF: DataFrame, lookupDF: DataFrame) = {
    val sourceKey = sourceDF.select("ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID")
    val lookupKey = lookupDF.select("ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID")
    val insertDF = sourceDF.join(lookupDF, sourceDF.col("ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID") =!= lookupDF.col("ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID"), "inner")
    val updateDF = sourceDF.join(lookupDF, sourceDF.col("ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID") === lookupDF.col("ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID"), "inner")
    (insertDF,updateDF)
  }

  def loadTarget(insertDF: DataFrame, updateDF: DataFrame) = {
    // inner join ZDT on ACC.PROC_ID = ZDT.PROC_ID
    // inner join ZDT on S.ACCTRPTS_DIM_UID = ZDT.PROC_ID
  }

}

A.CUSTOMER_NO,A.FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,A.GBG_ID,A.CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension B
WHERE A.CUSTOMER_NO=B.CUSTOMER_NO
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM)
;

--INSERTS OR NEW ROWS
select 'New Rows for Insert2' as Title, COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY1, A.* from fullJoin A WHERE existing_CUSTOMER_KEY is null;
--UPDATE ROWS
select 'Changed Rows for Update/Insert2' as Title, a.* from fullJoin a WHERE LOWER(CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum);

AND CURRENT_IND='Y'

INSERT INTO etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension 
select existing_CUSTOMER_KEY,1+existing_VERSION as VERSION , 
A.CUSTOMER_NO,A.FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,A.GBG_ID,A.CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'U' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
WHERE LOWER(CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension B
WHERE A.CUSTOMER_NO=B.CUSTOMER_NO
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;

--INSERTS OR NEW ROWS
select 'New Rows for Insert after insert' as Title, COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY1, A.* from fullJoin A WHERE existing_CUSTOMER_KEY is null;
--UPDATE ROWS
select 'Changed Rows for Update/Insert after insert' as Title, a.* from fullJoin a WHERE LOWER(CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum);


MERGE INTO etlhubconfirmed.customer_dimension A
USING fullJoin B
ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO
AND LOWER(B.CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(B.existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CURRENT_IND='N'
    ,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp
;


--INSERTS OR NEW ROWS
select 'New Rows for Insert After Update' as Title, COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY1, A.* from fullJoin A WHERE existing_CUSTOMER_KEY is null;
--UPDATE ROWS
select 'Changed Rows for Update/Insert After Update' as Title, a.* from fullJoin a WHERE LOWER(CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum);

--Soft deletes or no longer active in source


--SELECT * FROM fullJoin WHERE CUSTOMER_NO is NULL

MERGE INTO etlhubconfirmed.customer_dimension A
USING fullJoin B
ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.existing_CUSTOMER_NO
AND B.CUSTOMER_NO is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N'
    --,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp
;

A.CUSTOMER_NO,A.FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,A.GBG_ID,A.CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND NOT EXISTS

and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'

;

AND CURRENT_IND='Y'
;

*/


INSERT INTO etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension 
select existing_CUSTOMER_KEY,1+existing_VERSION as VERSION , 
A.CUSTOMER_NO,A.FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,A.GBG_ID,A.CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'U' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
WHERE LOWER(CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension B
WHERE A.CUSTOMER_NO=B.CUSTOMER_NO
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND A.column_hash=B.REC_CHECKSUM
)
;

--INSERTS OR NEW ROWS
select 'New Rows for Insert after insert' as Title, COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY1, A.* from fullJoin A WHERE existing_CUSTOMER_KEY is null;
--UPDATE ROWS
select 'Changed Rows for Update/Insert after insert' as Title, a.* from fullJoin a WHERE LOWER(CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum);


MERGE INTO etlhubconfirmed.customer_dimension A
USING fullJoin B
ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.CUSTOMER_NO
AND LOWER(B.CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(B.existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CURRENT_IND='N'
    ,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp
;


--INSERTS OR NEW ROWS
select 'New Rows for Insert After Update' as Title, COALESCE(existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY1, A.* from fullJoin A WHERE existing_CUSTOMER_KEY is null;
--UPDATE ROWS
select 'Changed Rows for Update/Insert After Update' as Title, a.* from fullJoin a WHERE LOWER(CUSTOMER_NO) = LOWER(existing_CUSTOMER_NO) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_rec_checksum);

--Soft deletes or no longer active in source


--SELECT * FROM fullJoin WHERE CUSTOMER_NO is NULL

MERGE INTO etlhubconfirmed.customer_dimension A
USING fullJoin B
ON A.CUSTOMER_NO = B.existing_CUSTOMER_NO
AND B.CUSTOMER_NO is NULL
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND='N'
    --,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp
;

    CUSTOMER_KEY INT NOT NULL,
	VERSION INT ,
	CUSTOMER_NO STRING ,
	FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD varchar(10) ,
	GBG_ID varchar(10)  ,
	CUSTOMER_NAME varchar(30)  ,
	CURRENT_IND varchar(1)  ,
	EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	SOURCE_SYSTEM varchar(50)  ,
	REC_CHECKSUM varchar(32)  ,
	REC_STATUS varchar(1)  ,
	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	DATA_IND varchar(10)  ,
	ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND char(1)  
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)

select COALESCE(A.existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS CUSTOMER_KEY,1 as VERSION , 
A.CUSTOMER_NO,A.FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD,A.GBG_ID,A.CUSTOMER_NAME,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT, 'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
LEFT JOIN etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension B
ON A.CUSTOMER_NO=B.CUSTOMER_NO
AND CURRENT_IND='Y'
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND B.REC_CHECKSUM <> A.column_hash
;

--CREATE DATABASE etlhubConfirmed;

-- Create Delta Lake table, define schema and location
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension (
    CUSTOMER_KEY INT NOT NULL,
	VERSION INT ,
	CUSTOMER_NO STRING ,
	FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD varchar(10) ,
	GBG_ID varchar(10)  ,
	CUSTOMER_NAME varchar(30)  ,
	CURRENT_IND varchar(1)  ,
	EXTRACT_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_START_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	REC_END_DT TIMESTAMP ,
	SOURCE_SYSTEM varchar(50)  ,
	REC_CHECKSUM varchar(32)  ,
	REC_STATUS varchar(1)  ,
	IMG_LST_UPD_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	IMG_CREATED_DT TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
	DATA_IND varchar(10)  ,
	ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND char(1)  
)
USING DELTA
PARTITIONED BY (CURRENT_IND)

# Stage the update by unioning two sets of rows
# 1. Rows that will be inserted in the whenNotMatched clause
# 2. Rows that will either update the current addresses of existing customers or insert the new addresses of new customers
stagedUpdates = (
     newAddressesToInsert
    .selectExpr("NULL as mergeKey", "*")   # Rows for 1
    .union(sparkDF.selectExpr("SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE as mergeKey", "*"))
    )

  stagedUpdates.alias("staged_updates"),
  "sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = mergeKey") \
.whenMatchedUpdate(
  condition = "sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = staged_updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE AND sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME <> staged_updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME",
  set = {                                      # Set current to false and endDate to source's effective date.
   "SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME" : "false",
   "SSM_STEP_NO" : "false"
  }

import pandas as pd
import sqlalchemy

with dbEngine.begin() as con:
    # 1. Create temp table
    con.execute("""
        CREATE TABLE #sellcycletemp11 (
            [SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE] NVARCHAR(100)
            , [SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME] NVARCHAR(100)
            , [SSM_STEP_NO]  NVARCHAR(100)
            , [SSM_STEP_NAME] NVARCHAR(100)
            )
    """)
    # 2. Insert into temp table
    sql_insert_products = f"INSERT INTO #sellcycletemp11 VALUES (?,?,?,?)"
    con.execute(sql_insert_products, df.values.tolist())

    # 3. Merge the #sellcycletemp with sellcycle
    sql_merge = """
        MERGE DBXDH.DHTS_SELL_CYCLE  AS Target
        USING #sellcycletemp11 AS Source
            ON Source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = Target.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE
        /* new records ('right match') */
        WHEN NOT MATCHED BY Target THEN
            INSERT ([SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE], [SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME], [SSM_STEP_NO], [SSM_STEP_NAME]) 
            VALUES (source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE, source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME, source.SSM_STEP_NO, source.SSM_STEP_NAME)
        /* matching records ('inner match') */
        WHEN MATCHED THEN 
            UPDATE SET
            Target.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME= Source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME
            , Target.SSM_STEP_NO = Source.SSM_STEP_NO
            , Target.SSM_STEP_NAME = Source.SSM_STEP_NAME
        /* deprecated records ('left match') */
        /* WHEN NOT MATCHED BY Source THEN
    DELETE */
 
 OUTPUT 
	$action
 , inserted.*
;
    """
    con.execute(sql_merge)

    # 4. Delete temporary table
    con.execute("""DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #sellcycletemp5;""")
    con.execute("""DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #sellcycletemp11;""")

import pandas as pd
import sqlalchemy

with dbEngine.begin() as con:
    # 1. Create temp table
    con.execute("""
        CREATE TABLE #sellcycletemp11 (
            [SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE] NVARCHAR(100)
            , [SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME] NVARCHAR(100)
            , [SSM_STEP_NO]  NVARCHAR(100)
            , [SSM_STEP_NAME] NVARCHAR(100)
            )
    """)
    # 2. Insert into temp table
    sql_insert_products = f"INSERT INTO #sellcycletemp11 VALUES (?,?,?,?)"
    con.execute(sql_insert_products, df.values.tolist())

    # 3. Merge the #sellcycletemp with sellcycle
    sql_merge = """
        MERGE DBXDH.DHTS_SELL_CYCLE  AS Target
        USING #sellcycletemp11 AS Source
            ON Source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = Target.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE
        /* new records ('right match') */
        WHEN NOT MATCHED BY Target THEN
            INSERT ([SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE], [SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME], [SSM_STEP_NO], [SSM_STEP_NAME]) 
            VALUES (source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE, source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME, source.SSM_STEP_NO, source.SSM_STEP_NAME)
        /* matching records ('inner match') */
        WHEN MATCHED THEN 
            UPDATE SET
            Target.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME= Source.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME
            , Target.SSM_STEP_NO = Source.SSM_STEP_NO
            , Target.SSM_STEP_NAME = Source.SSM_STEP_NAME
        /* deprecated records ('left match') */
        /* WHEN NOT MATCHED BY Source THEN
    DELETE */
 
 OUTPUT 
	$action
 , inserted.*
;
    """
    con.execute(sql_merge)

    # 4. Delete temporary table
    con.execute("""DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #sellcycletemp5;""")
    con.execute("""DROP TABLE IF EXISTS #sellcycletemp11;""")

sellcycletgtDF.toDF

newAddressesToInsert = sparkDF \
.alias("updates") \
.join(sellcycletgtDF.alias("sell_cycle"), "SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE") \
.selectExpr("updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE","updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME","updates.SSM_STEP_NO","updates.SSM_STEP_NAME") \
.where("sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE AND updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME <> sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME")

newAddressesToInsert.show()
# Stage the update by unioning two sets of rows
# 1. Rows that will be inserted in the whenNotMatched clause
# 2. Rows that will either update the current addresses of existing customers or insert the new addresses of new customers
stagedUpdates = (
     newAddressesToInsert
    .selectExpr("NULL as mergeKey", "*")   # Rows for 1
    .union(sparkDF.selectExpr("SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE as mergeKey", "*"))
    )
#stagedUpdates.show()


# Apply SCD Type 2 operation using merge
DBXDH.DHTS_SELL_CYCLE.alias("sell_cycle").merge(
  stagedUpdates.alias("staged_updates"),
  "sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = mergeKey") \
.whenMatchedUpdate(
  condition = "sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = staged_updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE AND sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME <> staged_updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME",
  set = {                                      # Set current to false and endDate to source's effective date.
   "SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME" : "false",
   "SSM_STEP_NO" : "false"
  }
#).whenNotMatchedInsert(
  #values = {
    #"SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE": "staged_updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE",
    #"SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME": "staged_updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME",
    #"SSM_STEP_NO": "staged_updates.SSM_STEP_NO",
    #"SSM_STEP_NAME": "staged_updates.SSM_STEP_NAME"  # Set current to true along with the new address and its effective date.
    # }
).execute()

#sellcycletgtDF.show()
#sparkDF.show()
# Rows to INSERT new addresses of existing customers
newAddressesToInsert = sparkDF \
.alias("updates") \
.join(sellcycletgtDF.toDF().alias("sell_cycle"), "SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE") \
.where("sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_CODE = true AND updates.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME <> sell_cycle.SIEBEL_SALES_STAGE_NAME")

#import necessary python libraries

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
from pyspark.sql.functions import trim,ltrim,rtrim
#conn = connect(':memory:')

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from delta.tables import *
#import os
import sys

#Read data from adls csv file extracted from source at https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.blob.core.windows.net/customer/BUSINESSPARTNER_FACT.csv

account_name = 'adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast' # fill in your primary account name 
container_name = 'customer' # fill in your container name 
relative_path = '' # fill in your relative folder path 

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

# Read a csv file 
csv_path = adls_path + 'BUSINESSPARTNER_FACT.csv' 
incrementalData_DF = spark.read.csv(csv_path, header = 'true')

tablename="etlhubConfirmed.opportunity_business_partner_daily_ft"
natural_key=['BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY','OPPORTUNITY_KEY','INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE']
keycolumn="BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_KEY"

existingDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT * FROM {}  WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(tablename))
# prefix all columns from target table with 'existing_'. This will help to differentiate columns when incremental and existing DF's are joined
existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])
existingMaxKeyDF=spark.sql("SELECT MAX({}) existing_MAX_KEY from {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(keycolumn,tablename))
#existingMaxKeyDF.show()
#joining with dimension tables
DIMDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT OPPORTUNITY_KEY,OPPORTUNITY_VERSION,OPPORTUNITY_NUM FROM etlhubConfirmed.opportunity WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'")
DIMDataDF1=spark.sql("SELECT BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY,BUSINESS_PARTNER_VERSION,BUSINESS_PARTNER_ID FROM etlhubConfirmed.business_partner WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'")
DIMJoin=incrementalData_DF.join(DIMDataDF,(trim(incrementalData_DF.OPPORTUNITY_NUM) == trim(DIMDataDF.OPPORTUNITY_NUM)), "fullouter") 
DIMJoin1=DIMJoin.join(DIMDataDF1,DIMJoin.BUSINESS_PARTNER_ID == DIMDataDF1.BUSINESS_PARTNER_ID, "fullouter") 
DIMJoin1.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')
DIMFinalJoinDF=spark.sql("select OPPORTUNITY_KEY,BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY,INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE from fulljoin")
#DIMFinalJoinDF.show()
incrementalData_DF1 = DIMFinalJoinDF.withColumn("nk_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *natural_key)))
col_list=[]
for i in DIMFinalJoinDF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)
# Add a checsum column to help identify the changed rows    
incrementalData_DF2 = incrementalData_DF1.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1,((incrementalData_DF2.OPPORTUNITY_KEY == existingDataDF1.existing_OPPORTUNITY_KEY) & (incrementalData_DF2.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY == existingDataDF1.existing_BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY) & (incrementalData_DF2.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE == existingDataDF1.existing_INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE)), "fullouter") 
fullJoin2=fullJoin1.join(existingMaxKeyDF,None,"CROSS")
#fullJoin2.show()
fullJoin2.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')
#Insert for New rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.
#fullJoin2.show()
qry= """
INSERT INTO {}
select COALESCE(A.existing_MAX_KEY,0) + ROW_NUMBER () OVER (ORDER BY 1) AS BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_KEY,1 as BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_VERSION , 
A.OPPORTUNITY_KEY,A.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY,A.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'I' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT,
'LG' AS DATA_IND, 
'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
LEFT JOIN etlhubConfirmed.opportunity_business_partner_daily_ft B
ON A.OPPORTUNITY_KEY=B.OPPORTUNITY_KEY AND A.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY=B.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY AND A.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE=B.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE
AND B.CURRENT_IND='Y'
WHERE existing_REC_CHECKSUM is null
AND COALESCE(B.REC_CHECKSUM,'') <> COALESCE(A.column_hash,'')
;
"""
spark.sql(qry.format(tablename))

qry1= """
INSERT INTO {} 
select existing_BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_KEY,1+BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_VERSION as BUSINESS_PARTNER_FACT_VERSION , 
A.OPPORTUNITY_KEY,A.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY,A.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE,'Y' AS CURRENT_IND, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS EXTRACT_DT, 
CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS REC_START_DT, '9999-12-31 00:00:00.000' as REC_END_DT, 'ESA' AS SOURCE_SYSTEM, A.column_hash as REC_CHECKSUM, 
'U' as REC_STATUS,current_timestamp as IMG_LST_UPD_DT, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP AS IMG_CREATED_DT ,
'LG' AS DATA_IND, 'Y' AS ACTIVE_IN_SOURCE_IND 
from fullJoin A 
WHERE OPPORTUNITY_KEY = existing_OPPORTUNITY_KEY AND BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY=existing_BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY AND TRIM(INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE)=TRIM(existing_INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE) and LOWER(column_hash) <> LOWER(existing_REC_CHECKSUM)
AND NOT EXISTS
(SELECT 1 FROM etlhubConfirmed.opportunity_business_partner_daily_ft B
WHERE A.OPPORTUNITY_KEY=B.OPPORTUNITY_KEY AND A.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY=B.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY AND A.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE=B.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE
and b.CURRENT_IND='Y'
AND COALESCE(A.column_hash,'')=COALESCE(B.REC_CHECKSUM,''))
;
"""
spark.sql(qry1.format(tablename))

qry2="""
MERGE INTO {} A
USING fullJoin B
ON --A.OPPORTUNITY_KEY=B.OPPORTUNITY_KEY AND A.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY=B.BUSINESS_PARTNER_KEY AND A.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE=B.INFLUENCER_ROLE_CODE
and LOWER(B.column_hash) <> LOWER(B.existing_rec_checksum)
AND A.CURRENT_IND='Y' AND A.REC_START_DT=b.existing_REC_START_DT
WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET CURRENT_IND='N'
    ,REC_END_DT= existing_REC_START_DT -  INTERVAL 5 seconds --current_timestamp --existing_REC_START_DT-1
    ,IMG_LST_UPD_DT=current_timestamp;
"""
spark.sql(qry2.format(tablename))
#Soft deletes or no longer active in source
qry3="""
MERGE INTO {} A
USING fullJoin B

%%sql

SELECT COUNT(*) as CNT, CUSTOMER_NO FROM incrementalData_DF2 GROUP BY CUSTOMER_NO HAVING COUNT(*)>1;

#import necessary python libraries

from azure.storage.blob import BlobClient
import pandas as pd
from io import StringIO
from pyspark.sql.functions import md5, concat_ws
from sqlite3 import connect
from pyspark.sql import functions as F
#conn = connect(':memory:')

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from delta.tables import *
#import os
import sys

#Read data from adls csv file extracted from source at https://adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast.dfs.core.windows.net/deltalake/data/customer/

account_name = 'adls4fsoetlhubdevuseast' # fill in your primary account name 
container_name = 'customer' # fill in your container name 
relative_path = '' # fill in your relative folder path 

adls_path = 'abfss://%s@%s.dfs.core.windows.net/%s' % (container_name, account_name, relative_path) 
print('Primary storage account path: ' + adls_path) 

# Read a csv file 
csv_path = adls_path + 'customer_data.csv' 
incrementalData_DF = spark.read.csv(csv_path, header = 'true')

tablename="etlhubConfirmed.customer_dimension"
natural_key="CUSTOMER_NO"
keycolumn="CUSTOMER_KEY"
#columns1 = ["FINANCIAL_COUNTRY_CD","CUSTOMER_DESC","GBG_ID"]

# Get column list for creating Rec_Checksum

#Add checks for duplicate data, Check for 1. dups in source data based on natural Key and
# 2. Dups in target already

col_list=[]
for i in incrementalData_DF.columns:
    col_list.append(i)
    #print (col_list)

# Add a checsum column to help identify the changed rows

incrementalData_DF1 = incrementalData_DF.withColumn("nk_hash",md5(natural_key))
incrementalData_DF2 = incrementalData_DF1.withColumn("column_hash", md5(concat_ws("", *col_list)))

#sell_cyclecolhashDF.show()
incrementalData_DF2.createOrReplaceTempView("incrementalData_DF2")

#Create a deltalake table with necessary columns

#incrementalData_DF2.show()

#existingDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT * from $table_name tgt WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'")
existingDataDF=spark.sql("SELECT * FROM {}  WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(tablename))
#existingDF.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDF')
#existingDataDF.show()

existingMaxKeyDF=spark.sql("SELECT MAX({}) existing_MAX_KEY from {} WHERE CURRENT_IND='Y'".format(keycolumn,tablename))
#existingMaxKeyDF.show()

# prefix all columns from target table with 'existing_'. This will help to differentiate columns when incremental and existing DF's are joined

existingDataDF1 = existingDataDF.select([F.col(c).alias('existing_'+c) for c in existingDataDF.columns])
#existingDataDF1.printSchema()

existingDataDF1.createOrReplaceTempView('existingDataDF1')

fullJoin1=incrementalData_DF2.join(existingDataDF1,incrementalData_DF2.CUSTOMER_NO == existingDataDF1.existing_CUSTOMER_NO, "fullouter") 
fullJoin2=fullJoin1.join(existingMaxKeyDF,None,"CROSS")

fullJoin2.createOrReplaceTempView('fullJoin')
#Insert for New rows which are missing in target and present in source based on Natural Key.
